name: James K. LEWIS, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Lewis v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: James K. LEWIS, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Arthur R. Thomas, Asst. Chief Counsel, Robert A. Greevy, Chief Counsel, Pa. Bd. of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Frank J. Madey, Asst. Public Defender, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
446 A.2d 599
James K. LEWIS, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 19, 1982.
Decided June 17, 1982.
Arthur R. Thomas, Asst. Chief Counsel, Robert A. Greevy, Chief Counsel, Pa. Bd. of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Frank J. Madey, Asst. Public Defender, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
